ygData.subject: Re: Need to find Diamond Dust!! Plz Help!
ygData.msgSnippet: Well, I posted earlier that there s a GNOME who sell gems at the INN in Rathe Mtn.  He s in the same building w/ the dwarf that give out the Dragonscale quest.
ygData.messageBody:
Well, I posted earlier that there's a GNOME who sell gems at the INN in
Rathe Mtn. He's in the same building w/ the dwarf that give out the
Dragonscale quest. Anyway, If you hail him, he said he can "REPAIR" jewelry
and "CUT" stones for different type. I tried different response but didn't
get anything out of him. YOu guys may have better luck. I'm thinking he'll
cut diamonds for you.

-Untos Gnomish Enchanter of Bertoxx

>Subject: Re: [EQ_Tinkering] Need to find Diamond Dust!! Plz Help!

>could

>thru
> there this weekend there were all kinds of Gnomes out there auctioning to
> buy it tho.
>
> Zindabus - Cazic-Thule >>
>
>I Apologise It turned out to be embalming dust on the mummy not diamond
>dust...But the Rathe Mountains looks like a good possibility.
>
